name: Let There be Kaos!!
description:
Let There be Kaos!! is a satire "dating sim" using Kaos as its protagonist, looking for a suitable date. This was made for the Brackeys 2021.2 Game Jam with the theme Let there be chaos, which I used like the phrase release the Kraken but releasing Kaos into the dating pool. 

Most images you see can be swiped or moved by dragging your left mouse button and you can press escape at any time to return to the main menu, this is explained in the tutorial though.

Pressing F9 will reset PlayerPrefs / Saves like your highscore. Just beware.

Using parodies of characters from the video game "Skylanders" under fair use (international copyright law), find out more about Skylanders here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Skylanders
